channel.title: Black screen when log in
channel.description: this just happened and i cant fix it its, really anooying anybody know what to do?

item.title: Black screen when log in
item.dc:creator: @Different1 Different`
item.description:
@Different1 wrote:

[quote=“i lured i, post:2, topic:220075”]Not to sure, try updating your java, or downloading the most recent.

~I Lured I~[/quote]
Lmfao, wrongo.

Hi HiyaScape:

You might have entered an uncomplete spot on your server. You can get yourself out of the spot by changing your co-ords or deleting your account. ( If you own the server.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 10:38:48 PM[/size][hr]Hope that helps if it does tell me so I can feel good about myself.

Roflmfao, Even worse then the first guy?

Try therapy. Maybe it will help you.

Can somebody “smart” tell him? These morons couldn’t solve a 10 peice puzzle.

Read full topic

item.title: Black screen when log in
item.dc:creator: @xema xema
item.description:
@xema wrote:

The same happened when I set memory usage on my batch file (-Xmxusagem), but your problem is with one of the packets that you have modified or simply your client has a flood, but you can still click on the Right interfaces (Inventory, Quests, Prefences, etc…) and whenever you log out and then back in, a packet is sent to the client translating it and making that work on the server, but the simplest thing you can do is remember what you did before this happened and then try fixing the error…

Read full topic
